title: Cinematic Trailer Music Pack Vol.3
description: A collection of 12 Cinematic Trailer Music tracks.
longDescription:
Did you know this pack is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?



 There are not many music tracks that grab attention from the beginning and last for the end. However, this track is specifically created to satisfy your audience in that manner and give them goosebumps while building up to a powerful ending note.




Potential use cases; action games, fps games, gaming soundtrack, cinematic trailers, background music for video games.




Ideal for passionate game developers, YouTubers, video editors, and gamers who need cinematic trailer music for their projects.


You can listen to the preview of the tracks here:

  • Epikton - A Hero's Journey 1:54
  • Epikton - A Story of Courage 3:03
  • Epikton - Battle Thrill 2:16
  • Epikton - Conspiracy Theory 2:31
  • Epikton - Destiny 3:07
  • Epikton - Dragon Kick 1:17
  • Epikton - Ecstasy 2:50
  • Epikton - Heroic Battle 1:10
  • Epikton - Life Of Inspiration 2:34
  • Epikton - Mind Of A Warrior 2:20
  • Epikton - Reign Of Fire 2:32
  • Epikton - The Mad King 1:01
